resp = client.index(
    index="index",
    id="1",
    document={
        "my_date": "2016-05-11T16:30:55.328Z"
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.search(
    index="index",
    query={
        "constant_score": {
            "filter": {
                "range": {
                    "my_date": {
                        "gte": "now-1h",
                        "lte": "now"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp1)
